item.title: The Week Ahead: Feb. 17 – 22, 2025 | Washington State House Republicans
item.description: News article "The Week Ahead: Feb. 17 – 22, 2025 | Washington State House Republicans" from House Republicans.

item.title: 👎Lance Eggers - OneAmerica
item.description: Lance Eggers signed up to testify Con.

item.title: 👎Georgia Brinkley - Citizen
item.description: Georgia Brinkley signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Citizen.

item.title: 👍💵Malou Chavez - Northwest Immigrant Rights Project
item.description: Malou Chavez signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Northwest Immigrant Rights Project. They are a registered lobbyist.
